overview:
MY LIFESTREAM From selling ships to consulting to entrepreneurship and many things in between- that’s how I would sum up my innings so far.

An obsessive ideator, I love to collaborate with diverse set of people to bring those ideas to life. I am passionate about my work, family and communities that I work with. I try to create as much value as I can in all my engagements.

EXPERIENCES My experiences include working with large global as well as mid-size companies in operations, sales and marketing, consulting and practice leadership. I have built practices grounds-up and engaged with C-Level executives in strategic assignments across the world.

My industry experiences include manufacturing, chemicals & petroleum, energy & utilities, automotive, transportation & logistics, education, telecom equipment, aviation defense and software products

SPECIALITIES Strategy, Alliances, Customer Engagement, Collaboration, Social CRM, Community Design, Innovation Management, Enterprise 2.0 and Social Learning

CURRENT WORK I am an independent Strategy & Performance Coach and work with small to mid- sized enterprises in the areas of strategy execution, new alliances, collaboration, innovation and performance management. I work directly with CEOs in taking their initiatives to the next level. My work is commitment-based and result-oriented.

I am also a Director at Aikon Labs a start-up focused on enabling enterprises, communities and institutions to bridge the idea-to-prototype life cycle by leveraging the power of social tools.

HOW TO CONNECT WITH ME I can be contacted via mail - rrdasguptaatgmaildotcom or reached on my cell +919850422786
